[Cross post with the PC]

Looking to offload a number of high value items over the next few weeks and thought I'd start with my Auction win from last December since I've had a few people ask me about it recently. Bidding will go the usual once, twice, then sold. I can delivery to most towns (not Teras, sorry) but would prefer FWI if possible.

Max light 8x runestaff with greater lightning flares and a +10 bonus to both Water and Air lores.

I've had no personal experience with it but Sighisoara has been using it since and I know he was impressed with it (as a Charl mage).

It traps a few verbs:

GET ~ As xxx draws an ethereal runestaff swirling with electric energy, luminescent slivers of electricity slither about its surface.

RUB ~ xxx's ethereal runestaff is set aglow as crackling ribbons of luminescent blue electricity creep about its surface.

WAVE ~ xxx waves her ethereal runestaff through the air and its surface is bathed in intertwined tendrils of luminescent blue energy.

WAVE (target) ~ xxx tilts his ethereal runestaff at you, and a crackling wisp of glowing blue energy zips forth and glides around you before dispersing into the air.

RAISE ~ xxx raises her ethereal runestaff into the air, and suddenly a whirling zephyr of light wreaths around her. The energy builds in intensity like the heart of a thunderstorm until her entire body is cloaked in the blazing aura. Slowly the maelstrom subsides with a barely-audible rumble, but xxx's eyes appear far more luminous. (temporarily changes your eye colour to "intense deep blue eyes").

MB: 50m CB: 55m Red (PC) BO: 100m

Note: I've set a very high BO as I'd prefer it to be an open auction but if you're willing to pay it, then it's yours!
